review_title: Great organization and great people to work with
job_title: Programs and Events in Cam, MS
pros: The people who work there are great and really driven by the mission. Great option for an internship to start your nonprofit career!
cons: There weren't any downsides for my experience

pros: Barakat employees very creative, wonderful people who really have passion for what they do. It was a wonderful work environment, particularly for someone looking to gain a very hands on experience.
cons: I feel I would have benefited from more training and mentorship throughout my internship. There could have been stronger leadership.
